JSRDotNETSDK Reference

IPulserReceiverIdentity Members

IPulserReceiverIdentity Interface  Methods  Properties  See Also

An object which can uniquely identify a pulser receiver. It has as a member an InstrumentIdentity object, which identifies which instrument this pulser receiver is part of. In the case where an instrument has more than one pulser receiver attached, there will be more than one IPulserReceiverIdentity objects with the same InstrumentIdentity member.

The following tables list the members exposed by the IPulserReceiverIdentity type.

Properties
Name Description
InstrumentId Gets the identifier of the instrument that this pulser receiver is part of.
PulserReceiverIndex Gets the zero-based index of the pulser receiver within an instrument. On instruments with pulser-rcvr A and pulser-rcvr B, 0 refers to pulser-rcvr A, and 1 refers to pulser-rcvr B. For instruments only one pulser receiver, this property will always be 0.
Top
Methods
Name Description
GetDescription Gets a description of the device represented by this pulser/receiver identity.
ToString Get a human-readable unique string for this pulser/receiver identity that will be different from any other pulser/receiver identity. This value is based on the InstrumentId model and serial number and the pulser receiver index.
Top
